text: Epoja, also known as Opoya, is a Wayana village situated on the Lawa River in French Guiana. == Geography == Epoja is conjoined with the village of Taluwen and Alawataimë enï and lies clies to the island village of Kulumuli. In the 1990s, a village by the name of Esperance was founded by Wayana migrating from Suriname next to Epoja and Taluwen. == Notes == == References == * * Category:Villages in French Guiana
title: Epoja
